question.title: Insertion in deque
question.content:
Given an array arr[] containing non-negative integers. You need to insert all elements of the array to deque and return it.

Examples :

Input: 1 2 3 4 5
Output: 1 2 3 4 5
Explanation: After insert in the deque it will look like {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}.

Input: 1
Output: 1
Explanation: After insert in the deque it will look like {1}.

Constraints:
1 ≤ arr.size() ≤ 105

rephrased.body: Given an array `arr[]` containing non-negative integers, insert all elements of the array into a deque and return the deque.

testcases.explanation: The deque will contain the elements in the same order as the input array: {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}.
The deque will contain the single element from the input array: {1}.
